page.title: 14TRANSPORT
page.content: People move in around Perrton in a variety of ways. Most people travel by motor vehicles around the area and towards Wolverhampton, Telford and Bridgnorth. Few people walk except along the pedestrisan lanes that lead to the Shops, Schools and other places of intrest. There are a number of pleasant walks that can take you into the countryside or towards Tettenhall. Others cycle to work because we are so close to Wolverhampton taking advantage of purpose lanes. The Bus Service goes to Wolverhampton and other nearby towns on a rugular basis. Not many people use the uses because of the high cost of the fares. It is the Car which is the most popular form of transport.
